summary: After Robert is fired from his own father's company, he feels like his luck has run out - until Morgan enters into his life.
cast: Darrin Dewitt Henson|Christian Keyes|Lamman Rucker|Gabrielle Dennis|Erica Hubbard|Josh Ventura|Richard Gallion|Tiffany Hines|Brely Evans|Christina De Leon|Ashanna Bri|Jaies Baptiste|Brandee Evans|LaChelle Hunt|La'Princess Jackson|Dominique Monroe|Alexx Ray
title: Black Coffee
